content: पू {c1c} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> (पवते, पूयते, पुनाति, पुनीते, पूत; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} पावयति; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} पुपूषति, पिपविषते) {@--1@} To make pure, cleanse, purify (<ab>lit.</ab> and <ab>fig.</ab>); अवश्यपाव्यं पवसे <ls>Bk. 6. 64</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">3. 18</ls>; पुण्याश्रमदर्शनेन तावदात्मानं पुनीमहे <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 105</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">2. 62</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 58</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 53</ls>; <ls>Bg. 10. 31.</ls> {@--2@} To refine. {@--3@} To clean from chaff, winnow. {@--4@} To expiate, atone for. {@--5@} To discern, discriminate. {@--6@} To think out, devise, invent. {@--7@} To become clear or pure (<ab>Atm.</ab>).
पू {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Purifying, cleansing, refining; as in खलपू &c.
